member.name: DISPATCHERQUEUE_THREAD_APARTMENTTYPE
member.summary: Specifies the threading apartment type for a new DispatcherQueueController.

member.name: DISPATCHERQUEUE_THREAD_APARTMENTTYPE.DQTAT_COM_NONE
member.summary: No COM threading apartment type specified.

member.name: DISPATCHERQUEUE_THREAD_APARTMENTTYPE.DQTAT_COM_ASTA
member.summary: Specifies an application single-threaded apartment (ASTA) COM threading apartment.

member.name: DISPATCHERQUEUE_THREAD_APARTMENTTYPE.DQTAT_COM_STA
member.summary: Specifies a single-threaded apartment (STA) COM threading apartment.
